title: Unable to connect with server please check your internet connection
body:
I was literally queued up with  my friends about an hour ago on the same wifi, and when I went to go solo, it said "Unable to connect to server...."
I'm using my university's wifi.
I also have problems when it's in the loading screen before a game, I can't alt tab without it bugspatting.
Come on riot.
What the h*ck.

replies.body: Yeouch, your university could be having a ton of traffic that can cause issues especially if you're on wifi.  Are you running on a mac of pc?
I am having the same problem

I'm Having the same Problem and its been happening for about 4 months now and sometimes it fixes itself but idk how i opened a ticket and the stupid staff %%%% didnt do anything to help so fucking get your shit together and look for a solution, I've seen so many other posts about this problem and no staff from riot has been bothered to fix it

Nop. Me and many of my Friends have this problem, it started with the preseason patch. I have tried to connect at my home and in my office wich have different ISP and the problem is there. same for my Friends :(
I can play fortnite and pubg with no problems at all.

Naw, this is happening to me for about a week or more, since the rune update, I called my internet provider  3 times they came to check, everything is fine, I reset windows 10, installed absolutely everything again in my pc, still having this problem only with league of legends, I can play everything else but league of legends. I found an old post, and describes exactly the problem I'm having and also others, since I'm checking this board everyday since then. I'm also with 20 minutes low priority que aswell due to this.

This is exactly whats happening.
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3944677&page=1

Is not the firewall, I deactivated everything related to security etc. 
I not the internet, is something about league of legends servers or their client. I tried everything.

I can log in, I can pick champs, but as soon the game load... full black screen. error pop up, and that's it, unable to connect , until the game is over.

This is my post I created about this some days ago, if u can see people there still having the issue.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/vFYOXVAj-unable-to-connect-to-match?comment=000400000000
